metadata.description: Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) reflecting the time in which the event was generated.

dataFlows.transformKql:
source
| project-rename eventId=id
| extend TimeGenerated = todatetime(parse_json(eventId).['time']) 
 | project-rename eventKind= ['kind']

connectorUiConfig.title: Google Workspace Activities (Preview)
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [Google Workspace](https://workspace.google.com/) Activities data connector provides the capability to ingest Activity Logs from [Google Workspace API](https://developers.google.com/admin-sdk/reports/reference/rest/v1/activities/list) into Microsoft Sentinel.

sampleQueries.description: Get a sample of Google Workspace Activity logs

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and Write permissions are required.

customs.name: Google Workspace API access
customs.description: Access to the Google Workspace activities API through Oauth are required.

instructionSteps.description:
Configure steps for the Google Reports API oauth access. Then, provide the required information below and click on Connect.
>
instructionSteps.title: Connect to Google Workspace to start collecting user activity logs in Microsoft Sentinel
